# Changelog

## 1.2.1 (2025-09-25)
* Update dependencies ([MGNLCLI-436](https://magnolia-cms.atlassian.net/browse/MGNLCLI-436))

## 1.2.0 (2025-04-03)
* Pass a command argument from the CLI to a plugin ([MGNLCLI-343](https://magnolia-cms.atlassian.net/browse/MGNLCLI-343))

## 1.1.3 (2025-02-25)
* Add depcheck to husky ([MGNLCLI-289](https://magnolia-cms.atlassian.net/browse/MGNLCLI-289))
* Address deprecated packages ([MGNLCLI-320](https://magnolia-cms.atlassian.net/browse/MGNLCLI-320))

## 1.1.2 (2024-10-14)
* aligned README and messages, and updated author and license information

## 1.1.1 (2023-11-23)
* add the `usage` optional property ([MGNLCLI-73](https://magnolia-cms.atlassian.net/browse/MGNLCLI-73))

## 1.1.0 (2023-10-12)
* add the `init()` method to pass a logger from the MGNL CLI to log errors and other information that occurs during the runtime of the plugin ([MGNLCLI-46](https://magnolia-cms.atlassian.net/browse/MGNLCLI-46))
* remove the `help()` method ([MGNLCLI-46](https://magnolia-cms.atlassian.net/browse/MGNLCLI-46))

## 1.0.0 (2023-07-13)
* introduce `@magnolia/cli-plugin-template` package
